## Workspace.getAllVariables() method

> Warning: This API is now obsolete.
> 
> v12: use Blockly.Workspace.getVariableMap().getAllVariables.
> 

Return all variables of all types.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getAllVariables(): IVariableModel<IVariableState>[];
```
**Returns:**

[IVariableModel](./blockly.ivariablemodel.md)<!-- -->&lt;[IVariableState](./blockly.ivariablestate.md)<!-- -->&gt;\[\]
